name: Impress.ai
description: Launched in 2017, impress.ai (registered as ideatory Pte. Ltd.) is a no-code, self-service platform that is highly focused on simplifying and accelerating various parts of the recruitment workflow. Its co-founders observed problems in hiring processes at several companies before even starting impress.ai.
features: Personalised candidate engagement at every touchpoint.
AI/ML-powered assessments and evaluations for accurate hiring.
Navigate effortlessly with minimal technical knowledge and training.
Headline: The complete talent platform: simple, accessible, responsive, and always on!

Highlights.name: Faster screening time
Highlights.description: Self-serve, automated candidate screening solutions that save recruiters’ time and effort.

Highlights.name: Diversity, equity, and inclusion
Highlights.description: Unbiased hiring decisions to achieve DEI hiring objectives.

Highlights.name: Seamless integrations
Highlights.description: Integrates seamlessly with your ATS, Assessments, Analytics tools and more.

enhanced_description: Launched in 2017, Impress.ai (registered as ideatory Pte. Ltd.) is a no-code, self-service platform designed to simplify and accelerate various parts of the recruitment workflow. It functions as a complete talent platform, focusing on making accurate hiring decisions. The platform provides personalized candidate engagement at every touchpoint and utilizes AI/ML-powered assessments and evaluations for accurate hiring. It is built for effortless navigation, requiring minimal technical knowledge and training, and integrates seamlessly with existing ATS, assessments, and analytics tools. Key benefits include faster screening times through automated solutions and supporting unbiased hiring decisions to achieve Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) objectives.
key_use_cases: Achieving Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) hiring objectives
competitive_advantages: AI/ML-powered assessments and evaluations for accurate hiring
Effortless navigation with minimal technical knowledge and training
Faster screening time through automated solutions
Supports unbiased hiring decisions for Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI)
Seamless integrations with ATS, Assessments, and Analytics tools
implementation_scenarios: Integration into existing HR technology stacks (ATS, assessment tools, analytics tools)
roi_benefits: Reduced recruiter time and effort (faster screening)
Achievement of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) hiring objectives
compliance_features: Support for Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) hiring objectives through unbiased decision-making
